titleStmt.title: An abstract of common principles of a just vindication of the rights of the kingdom of God upon earth against the politick machinations of Erastian hereticks out of the Vindication of the deprived bishops, &c. / by a very learned man of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Stephens (Socrates Christianus). Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
